modifyHyperparameterGroup: Modifying the hyperparameter group will overwrite the hyperparameter values of the original group.

StopWorkloadDialog.header: Are you sure you want to stop the fine-tune experiment {name}?
StopWorkloadDialog.content: Stopping the fine-tune experiment may result in the loss of experimental data. Before stopping the workload "{name}", please ensure that business data is saved in storage. Once the experiment is stopped, it cannot be restarted.
StopWorkloadDialog.stopSuccess: Stop the fine-tune experiment {name} task issued successfully. Please refresh the fine-tune experiment list later.
StopWorkloadDialog.stopError: Failed to stop the fine-tune experiment {name}. Reason:

deleteFineTuningExperimentContent: Are you sure you want to delete the fine-tune experiment {name}? Removing it will result in the loss of all corresponding data, and it cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
resourceAllocationInfo: By default, the system uses a resource configuration of 2 cores CPU, 48GiB memory, and 1 GPU for each job.
